task_summary: Detect, grasp, and place the red container on the table surface.

task_long_description.overview: A UR-style manipulator interacts with several tabletop items (red can, blue can, snack stack, green bottle, translucent cup, purple cup). The goal is to handle the red container and place it down on the table. The behavior first perceives and aligns to the object, computes a grasp, grasps it with a pinch strategy, lifts to clear neighbors, then gently places it onto the table before retreating.
preconditions: Robot reachable workspace includes the red container and table area
Table surface clear enough for placement
stepwise_plan: Open gripper and detect the red container
Verify visibility and approach with alignment
Compute grasp pose and confirm it is available
Execute pinch grasp and verify stability
Lift slightly, then place onto table with low press force
success_criteria: Red container ends upright on table area
Robot retreats to a safe pose
failure_and_recovery: If detection fails, re-run detection and adjust approach
If grasp is unstable, reopen and retry compute+grasp
If placement contact not reached in time, lower again and reattempt
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when the red container is released on the table and the robot has retreated.

frame_3.now_evidence: Gripper precisely aligned near the red can on the right; first clear contact/alignment cue.
frame_3.predicts_next: Grasp execution is imminent followed by lifting.

node_specs.description: Ensure gripper is open before approaching object.
Verify that the object is visible.
Approach and align to grasp pose.
Compute grasp pose for the red container.
Check grasp pose exists on blackboard.
Place the object down on the table.
Back off to a safe pose.

recovery_strategy: Recompute grasp pose and retry grasp
Lower slowly to re-contact before placing
assumptions: Frames depict grasping a small red can on the right, not placing; instruction requests 'place down red bottle'. Preference given to frames, so target set to 'red_can'.
Placement location assumed to be the table surface; exact pose unspecified.

expected_success_criteria: Red container placed on the table and released
No collisions and stable grasp prior to place
